channel.title: Need help with two things, please read
channel.description: i need help making it where a npc says whether im online or not, also i need help with making a custon pk box. Im not asking you to give me the exect code or anything, just give me an example to teach me how to do it.

@Taylor_John0 wrote:

For pkbox, add a command to tele there, and add whatever npcs you want in autospawn.cfg, that simple

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with two things, please read
item.dc:creator: @P_16 P 16
item.description:
@P_16 wrote:

put this in npc handler

just change the npc type to the npc u want it to be

and change owner zack to ur name

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2000) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("owner zack")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "owner zack is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "owner zack is OFFLINE"; } } }

Read full topic
